snippet: At least 28 people, including 22 Belgian and Dutch schoolchildren, were killed when the bus bringing them back from a skiing holiday crashed in Switzerland.
abstract: Bus bringing 22 Dutch and Belgian children back from a skiing holiday crashes in Switzerland, killing at least 28.

byline.contributor: Nick Cumming-Bruce contributed reporting from Geneva, and Alan Cowell from London.

lead_paragraph: At least 28 people, including 22 Belgian and Dutch schoolchildren, were killed when the bus bringing them back from a skiing holiday crashed in Switzerland.

headline.seo: 22 Children Die in Swiss Bus Crash
headline.main: 22 Children Die in Swiss Bus Crash
headline.print_headline: Bus Crash in Switzerland Kills Children on Ski Trip
